amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Board of Regents; authority to expend money.
amendatorysection.para: To enable the Board of Regents to carry out the provisions of sections 85-216 to 85-219, it is hereby authorized to expend such amount of money as it deems necessary from any money hereafter appropriated to carry out the spirit and intent of said sections.
